skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dreame robot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mi Home is a skill that allows users to bind their Mi Home ID to Amazon Alexa. After account linked, users will be able to control Dreame devices via Alexa.
Note: Firstly, make sure your robot vacuum is added and online on Mi Home App.
1.Go to “Skills & Games” then search for Mi Home.
2.Link your Mi Home App to Alexa to discover devices in your Mi Home account that Alexa can control.
3.If Alexa does not show “discover devices” option or failed to find connected devices, you can discover manually.
4.Go to devices list and check if the robot vacuum appears and now you can use your Alexa to start and stop cleaning.`
